dcterms:creator: K. Bredies
K. Kunisch
T. Pock
dcterms:description: Total Generalized Variation (TGV) is a penalty functional for modeling images with edges and smooth variations, interpreted as a sparse penalization of optimal balancing from the first up to the k-th distributional derivative.
dcterms:title: Total Generalized Variation (TGV)

dcterms:creator: R. Temam
dcterms:description: Bounded Deformation (BD) is a space of vector fields of Bounded Deformation, which includes vector fields such that the distributional symmetrized derivative is a Radon measure.
dcterms:title: Bounded Deformation (BD)

dcterms:creator: L. I. Rudin
S. Osher
E. Fatemi
dcterms:description: Total Variation (TV) is a regularization functional that allows for discontinuities to appear along hypersurfaces, suitable for images with edges.
dcterms:title: Total Variation (TV)

dcterms:creator: B. Hofmann
B. Kaltenbacher
C. PÃ¶schl
O. Scherzer
dcterms:description: The Tikhonov functional is a regularization method used in inverse problems, particularly for minimizing the discrepancy between measured data and model predictions.
dcterms:title: Tikhonov functional

dcterms:creator: A. Chambolle
P.-L. Lions
dcterms:description: Image recovery via Total Variation minimization is a method for restoring images by minimizing the Total Variation functional.
dcterms:title: Image recovery via Total Variation minimization

dcterms:creator: A. Chambolle
T. Pock
dcterms:description: The primal-dual algorithm for convex problems is a numerical method used to solve optimization problems in imaging.
dcterms:title: Primal-dual algorithm for convex problems

dcterms:creator: T. F. Chan
S. Esedoglu
F. E. Park
dcterms:description: The staircase reduction in texture extraction is a method for improving image restoration by reducing the staircase effect in images.
dcterms:title: Staircase reduction in texture extraction

dcterms:creator: M. Nikolova
dcterms:description: Local strong homogeneity of a regularized estimator is a property that describes the behavior of estimators in the context of regularization.
dcterms:title: Local strong homogeneity of a regularized estimator

dcterms:creator: W. Ring
dcterms:description: Structural properties of solutions to Total Variation regularization problems describe the characteristics and behaviors of solutions obtained through Total Variation methods.
dcterms:title: Structural properties of solutions to Total Variation regularization problems
